com.here.android.mpa.nlp

Interface Nlp.OnParameterListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Nlp.ListenerBase
    Enclosing class:
    Nlp

    public static interface Nlp.OnParameterListener
extends Nlp.ListenerBase
    Parameter event listener interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onParameterChanged(Error error, Intention.Field parameter, Intention.Value value)
      A callback with the parameter and its value set by the user.

    • Method Detail

      • onParameterChanged

        void onParameterChanged(Error error,
                        Intention.Field parameter,
                        Intention.Value value)
        A callback with the parameter and its value set by the user. Supported values are as follow:
        • Intention.Field.ONLINE_DEDUCTION:
          • if Intention.Value.ON, NLP will process deduction online. e.g. "use backend"
          • if Intention.Value.OFF, NLP will process deduction offline. e.g. "don't use backend"
          See also Nlp.setOnlineDeductionEnabled(boolean) and Nlp.isOnlineDeductionEnabled().
        • Intention.Field.DISTANCE_MEASURE:
          • if Intention.Value.KILOMETER, NLP will use metric measurement system. e.g. "use metric system", "use kilometers", "tell me in meters".
          • if Intention.Value.MILE, NLP will use imperial measurement system. e.g. "use imperial system", "use miles", "tell me in yards", "tell me in feet".

          Please note that user may temporarily override the measurement system by explicitly specifying the measurement in the utterance.

          e.g. "Tell me how far McDonalds is in metric".

          See also Nlp.setMetricSystemEnabled(boolean) and Nlp.isMetricSystemEnabled()
        Parameters:
        error - Error.NONE if user requested parameter is successfully set to the requested value; otherwise Error.FAILED
        parameter - The parameter that has been changed if error is Error.NONE; otherwise this represents the parameter user wants to change.
        value - The new value of the parameter if error is Error.NONE; otherwise this represents the value user wants to change the parameter to.
